Action: Zip Code Section/Check Availability: Functionality
Verify Zip Code numeric 5 digits->  Enter 5 digit zip code Click Check Availability

Action: Navigate back to Landing page from Business-> Click on Frontier logo
Expected Result: Frontier Commincations Landing page (https://internet.frontier.com/)displays no errors

Action: Verify Zip Code numeric 1 -4 digits->  Enter 1 digit zip code ->Click Check Availability (Repeating up to 4 digits)
Expected Result: Warning message should display " Please enter 5 digit zip code." Zip code box clears and no navigation to https://internet.frontier.com/plans-pricing.html

Action: Verify Zip Code Alpha/Symbols-> Enter "w$W" zip code->Click Check Availability
Expected Result: Warning message should display " Please enter 5 digit zip code." Zip code box clears and no navigation to https://internet.frontier.com/plans-pricing.html

Action: Verify Zip Code empty-> Zip code field null-> Click Check Availability
Expected Result: Warning message should display " Please enter 5 digit zip code." Zip code box clears and no navigation to https://internet.frontier.com/plans-pricing.html
